ygData.subject: Re: Grrrrrrrr!
ygData.msgSnippet: Illusion, and size of the beast.  You are 6 feet away from the center of a giant when you are standing at his big toe.  Stand at the toe of a cutthroat and
ygData.messageBody:
Illusion, and size of the beast. You are 6 feet away from the "center" of a
giant when you are standing at his big toe. Stand at the toe of a cutthroat
and you are 6 inches away from him.

Also, the "big" giant just creates an illusion of you being closer than you
actually are.



----- Original Message -----
From: "Dark" <jackal@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 21, 1999 6:20 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Grrrrrrrr!


> From: "Dark" <jackal@...>
>
> Cyclops and giants in particular are diffrent. I'm not sure why but I
> imagine it has something to do with the size of graphic anuyhow you
actually
> have to get real close to tose particular npcs. Like I said not sure why
> though.
>
> Naeeldar
>

for

that

Dervish's
